
broccoli-builder
==============================================================================

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/ember-cli/broccoli-builder.svg?branch=0-18-x)](https://travis-ci.org/ember-cli/broccoli-builder)

Installation
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

```bash
npm install broccoli-builder
```
